# Add form validation to Materials creation

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-10](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-10/add-form-validation-to-materials-creation)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
The Materials creation form lacks proper validation.

**Location:** frontend/src/pages/MaterialsPage.tsx

**Issues:**

* No validation for material name (required)
* Quantity can be negative
* Delivery date in past not warned
* No error feedback to user

**Expected Behavior:**

* Validate required fields
* Validate quantity is positive
* Warn on past delivery dates
* Show inline validation errors

**Priority:** Medium
